Room.Name: Kista Stables and Exercise Yard
Room.ShortDescription: There is an abundance of vacant stables in which to leave your trusty steed. A nearby sign proclaims that horses are exercised daily.
Room.LongDescription: The exercise yard is a large field which extends to the north and east of the stables. It is primarily a large track where people can train their horses for everything from simple trail riding to knightly jousting and fox hunting.
